summary: Mobile app “Monthly Payment Tracker” for manually tracking monthly income/expenses with secure auth, transaction entry, monthly totals/balance, summaries, optional notifications, filters, and basic charts.
architectural_notes: Transactions are entered manually; app does not connect to real bank accounts.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- App icon: minimal ledger/checkmark symbol, flat design, warm green palette (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Empty state illustration: simple wallet and receipt outline, light background, warm green + neutral gray (empty-transactions.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Implement secure user registration/login using Internet Identity, and gate all app features (transactions, summaries, charts) behind authentication.

Build a mobile-first transaction entry UI that allows authenticated users to add a transaction as Received (Income) or Sent (Expense) with amount, date, and short note, including basic validation and clear error messages in English.
Implement monthly filtering for viewing transaction history: users can select a month/year and view only transactions within that month, ordered by date (newest first).
Automatically calculate and display monthly totals for the selected month: total received amount, total sent amount, and monthly balance (Received – Sent).
Add a Monthly Summary screen for the selected month that clearly displays income (received), expenses (sent), and balance, with a clean layout suitable for small screens.

Implement an optional in-app monthly summary notification mechanism that can alert the user when a month has ended and a summary is ready, without relying on push notifications or external messaging services.
Add basic charts to visualize income vs expenses for the selected month (e.g., simple side-by-side bars or a two-segment comparison), rendered in a mobile-friendly way.
Apply a cohesive, simple, user-friendly visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) consistently across all screens, optimized for a mobile-first experience.
Ensure the app explicitly communicates that transactions are entered manually and that the app does not connect to real bank accounts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Transaction CRUD: add income/expense with amount, date, and note
Persist transactions in a database (local or backend)
Monthly calculations: total received, total sent, and monthly balance
Monthly summary screen showing income, expenses, and balance
Monthly filters for viewing transaction history
Basic charts visualizing income vs expenses

Create a backend transactions data model and persistence for each authenticated user, supporting adding and listing transactions with: type (Received/Income or Sent/Expense), amount, date, and short note.
